attributes.action: Address the youth on homelessness through education initiatives
attributes.additional_details:
By implementing this curriculum, we prepare our youth for real-world challenges, reducing future financial crises and homelessness. Financial literacy fosters responsible spending and saving habits, while understanding homelessness prevention builds empathy and 
support. It’s a proactive measure to create a financially stable and compassionate society, ensuring our children are equipped for success and resilience.
attributes.background: As a citizen, I urge Parliament to mandate a comprehensive curriculum in schools that focuses on financial literacy and homelessness prevention. It is imperative to educate our youth on how to manage their finances effectively, avoid debt, and understand the consequences of financial mismanagement.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action:  
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701663
